value.stringValue: Opportunity :- {!$Record.Name} Loan Process has been Initiated
Sales Deed Status Has Been Changed To Original Uploaded
Stage has been updated to Progressive Stage
New Opportunity {!$Record.Name} has been Assigned to you
KYC Verification Task has been Assigned to MIS Team
An Opportunity :- {!$Record.Name} has been assigned to you

formulas.name: RegistrationScheduledBody
formulas.expression:
'Registration has been scheduled for opportunity ' + {!$Record.Name} + '
Unit Number: ' + {!$Record.Plot_Name__c} + '
NOC Status: ' + TEXT({!$Record.NOC__c}) + '
BR Status: ' + TEXT({!$Record.BR_Status__c}) + '
Date Of Registration: ' + TEXT({!$Record.Date_of_Registration__c})
